sn35.129:1: On one occasion the Venerable Ānanda was dwelling at Kosambı in Ghosita's Park. Then the householder Ghosita approached the Venerable Ānanda … and said to him:sn.iv.4"Venerable Ānanda, it is said, ‘diversity of elements, diversity of elements.’[n.22]Dhātunānatta.SeeSN4.–0. For each sense modality there are three elements—sense faculty, object, and consciousness—hence a total of eighteen.In what way, venerable sir, has the diversity of elements been spoken of by the Blessed One?"
